A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I give this 1.5 because it is a very good movie and beautiful. Great action and I even like the modern dialogue and humour. It's a horrible movie to me if you like anything to do with what Star Wars is and apparently was to so many people. I get it that Disney is trying to redefine what the Star Wars \"franchise\" is and can be but it doesn't mean that I have to like that fact or the products that contribute to that fact. As a Star Wars movie - 1.5 stars and only 1.5 because it took place in the Star Wars universe. I don't have to like the movie just because it is well directed and beautifully shot - because through its story it has ruined what Star Wars means to me. Thanks Disney. But who cares what a 33 year old thinks right??? Out with the old in with the new.
